A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I never have reviewed a movie before but I had to say this.  I saw my brother at Christmas and he knew I had seen this movie last week and he hasn't seen it yet.  He didn't want the movie spoiled but asked a few loose questions about it.

He asked me what the plot to this movie is.  After thinking about it for a minute I realized I couldn't answer that question.  This movie was such a mess with such bad pacing and gaping holes to the story\, I really couldn't say what it was actually about.

My brother then asked if there is any follow up/answers to the questions brought out in The Force Awakens.  Ummmmmm......No.  

He then asked if Ren/Rey/Finn/Poe and their stories progress.  Yeahhhh\, not really.  

So\, he asked who is the main character\, is it mostly about Luke?.........

Nope....we see Finn go on a journey to a casino with a new character Rose\, this is mostly what I remember\, as this seemed to be a major plotline.  Is Rose a stormtrooper or Jedi he asked.....nope\, a janitor and a pretty boring addition at that.

Does Rey train with Luke?  Sure\, for about 6 minutes.

Are there classic lightsaber battle scenes?  Welllll\, sort of?

It was during this conversation that I realized how badly this movie sucked.  JJ Abrams has his work cut out for him in fixing this mess to move on in 9.  May the Force be with him.
